scripts.build:web: npm run copy:sql:wasm && npm run build
scripts.build:native: npm run remove:sql:wasm && npm run build
scripts.ios:start: npm run remove:sql:wasm && npm run build:native && npx cap sync && npx cap copy && npx cap open ios
scripts.android:start: npm run remove:sql:wasm && npm run build:native && npx cap sync && npx cap copy && npx cap open android
scripts.electron:prepare: npm run remove:sql:wasm && npm run build && npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap copy @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.electron:start: npm run electron:prepare && cd electron && npm run electron:start
